name: Luxor 3
description: A brave young Pharaoh, killed prematurely by a fierce sandstorm and embodied by the gods as a skillful scarab, must battle the powerful god of Chaos, Set, to free the essences of other Egyptian gods contained within colorful magical spheres.
minimum_requirements: Supported OS: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP/Vista DirectX Version: 32 MB DirectX 8.1 compatible graphics card or better Processor: Pentium II 700MHz Memory: 256MB RAM Sound: DirectSound-compatible sound card Hard Drive: 60MB free HD space
